hero.title: Land Your Dream Job with AI-Powered LinkedIn Automation
hero.subtitle: Junior helps you engage with hiring posts automatically, saving you hours while making meaningful connections with recruiters and hiring managers.

benefits.saveTime: Save 10+ hours per week on LinkedIn engagement
benefits.moreResponses: Get 3x more responses from hiring managers

aiComments.title: AI-Powered Comment Generation
aiComments.description: Generates personalized, context-aware comments that add value to conversations with hiring managers and recruiters.

naturalPatterns.title: Natural Interaction Patterns
naturalPatterns.description: Mimics human-like engagement with variable response times and natural interaction flows for authentic conversations.

smartPrioritization.title: Smart Post Prioritization
smartPrioritization.description: Advanced algorithms identify and prioritize the most relevant job opportunities based on your skills and preferences.

networkOptimization.title: Network Optimization
networkOptimization.description: Intelligently manages your engagement to build meaningful connections without overwhelming your network.

adaptiveEngagement.title: Adaptive Engagement
adaptiveEngagement.description: Continuously learns from your interactions to improve response quality and engagement strategies.

secureSession.title: Secure Session Management
secureSession.description: Maintains secure, persistent connections while respecting platform guidelines and best practices.

analytics.title: Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Tracks engagement metrics and response rates to help you refine your job search strategy.

customizable.title: Customizable Settings
customizable.description: Tailor the automation to match your personal brand and job search goals with flexible configuration options.

step1.title: Download & Install
step1.description: Simple one-click installation for Windows and Mac.

step2.description: Secure OAuth connection with one-time setup.

step3.title: Configure Settings
step3.description: Set your preferences and customize engagement style.

step4.title: Start Automating
step4.description: Let Junior work in the background while you focus on your job search.

story.title: My Story
story.paragraph1: I want to share how I found success in this terrible job market.
story.paragraph2: After being laid off twice since 2022 and having to sell my house, I know firsthand how brutal this job market is. I'm not alone - it's really difficult out there for so many people.
story.paragraph3: Success in job hunting isn't about volume resume blasts. It's about conversations with real people who can connect you to real opportunities.
story.paragraph4: The problem I faced was simple: I couldn't get enough conversations with the right people. In six weeks, I had just one interview. That interview came from a single comment I left on a post about a company hiring. The person replied the same day, we spoke the next day, and a week later I was talking to the hiring manager.
story.paragraph5: Job seeking shouldn't be about hoping for a conversation - it should start with one.
story.paragraph6: That's why I built Junior. It's an automated inbound personal marketing engine that helped me turn things around. It worked so well that I decided to start a company so you can have your own Junior.
story.paragraph7: If you're struggling to start conversations with the right people, I encourage you to give Junior a try.
story.paragraph8: Have the right conversation, at the right time. Unlock new opportunities that can change your life. It changed mine.
